threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: lol imagine thinking it's just about "funding wars" when the real issue is those crazy green policies driving up costs. try focusing on the real problem. energy independence means less regulation, not more handouts.   🇺🇸
